# Flex-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                                                                                      | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `alignSelf` | `align-self` | Defines how this flex item is aligned along the cross axis. This overwrites the cross axis alignment set by the container. Corresponds to the "alignSelf" css property.          | `"auto" \| "baseline" \| "center" \| "end" \| "start" \| "stretch" \| BreakpointValues<"center" \| "start" \| "end" \| "stretch" \| "baseline" \| "auto"> & string`                                                           | `'auto'`    |
| `flex`      | `flex`       | The shorthand property for the combined definition of "shrink", "grow" and "basis"                                                                                               | `"auto" \| "equal" \| "initial" \| "none" \| BreakpointValues<"auto" \| "none" \| "initial" \| "equal"> & string`                                                                                                             | `'initial'` |
| `grow`      | `grow`       | The ability to allow/disallow the flex child to grow.                                                                                                                            | `"0" \| "1" \| BreakpointValues<"1" \| "0"> & string`                                                                                                                                                                         | `'0'`       |
| `offset`    | `offset`     | The offset of the column. You can also supply values for specific breakpoints, like {base: "none", l: "one-quarter"}. You always need to provide a base value when doing this.   | `"half" \| "none" \| "one-quarter" \| "one-third" \| "three-quarters" \| "two-thirds" \| BreakpointValues<"one-quarter" \| "one-third" \| "half" \| "two-thirds" \| "three-quarters" \| "none"> & string`                     | `'none'`    |
| `shrink`    | `shrink`     | The ability to allow/disallow the flex child to shrink.                                                                                                                          | `"0" \| "1" \| BreakpointValues<"1" \| "0"> & string`                                                                                                                                                                         | `'1'`       |
| `width`     | `width`      | The width of the flex item. You can also supply values for specific breakpoints, like {base: "full", l: "one-quarter"}. You always need to provide a base value when doing this. | `"auto" \| "full" \| "half" \| "one-quarter" \| "one-third" \| "three-quarters" \| "two-thirds" \| BreakpointValues<"auto" \| "one-quarter" \| "one-third" \| "half" \| "two-thirds" \| "three-quarters" \| "full"> & string` | `'auto'`    |
